content.rendered:
God
Can you hear me
Can you reach down
And speak to my heart
Touch my life
Your work of art

Can you hear
My silent prayer
And meet my needs
Whatever they are

You ate there
And I am here
But I cannot see
Your loving hand
When you are silent
From where I stand
Your mercies abound
But I am dry
Though my spirit may weep
I do not cry
For loving kindness
Though I may try
To understand
To understand why
I do not hear you
My spirit is dry

Do you still speak
My spirit to hear
Are you still working
I know that you are
Though I cannot see you
And hear you I can’t
My faith says you are working
On me
Your work of art
